name: market for polyether polyols, short chain, ISOPA | polyether polyols, short chain, ISOPA | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/29646/documentation

This dataset links to pre-allocated industry data from ISOPA (European trade association for producers of diisocyanates and polyols), available at https://plasticseurope.org/sustainability/circularity/life-cycle-thinking/eco-profiles-set/, published in April 2021. ecoinvent cannot guarantee that the upstream and downstream supply chains were linked to the ecoinvent database, while the intermediate exchanges are not maintained with the annual database updates. The respective dataset that is linked to the ecoinvent database value chains has an activity name “polyether polyols production, short chain”.;This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'polyether polyols, short chain, ISOPA' in the European geography.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'polyether polyols, short chain, ISOPA' within the geography of Europe.

This activity ends with the supply of 1 kg of polyether polyols, short chain, ISOPA, to the consumers of this product. Transport is not included. No product losses are included.
